channel.title: PwnScape 3 - How to remove that if you decline you log out
channel.description:
If I decline on a trade, (at both interfaces), it will make both players lose connection.
No, this isnt a anti dupe, it even helps dupers, if other player accepted, and you accept decline on any time, you auto log out, and he does, and you got duped, I tested it several times.
Please help me fixing this, Base is PwnScape 3 from Faded Vision.

item.title: PwnScape 3 - How to remove that if you decline you log out
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

[quote=“Aintaro, post:2, topic:272254”]1 Big hint : Use dragon-history V4.0 and u won’t have that problem

If you dont want to use that, Than just search for disconnected = true in the trade method and remove that xd

Btw pwnscape source dont got anti syipkpkerrs and no anti nulls and also no anti dupe wtf lol?[/quote]

Oh that must mean its better.

Its not like theres tutorials on those EVERYWHERE and any RETARD could add it.

Dragonhistory must be great.

Read full topic
item.source: PwnScape 3 - How to remove that if you decline you log out
